original_text: So you should continue to trust God all the time. Then you will become stronger as a believer. You will become completely how you should be. You will not need anything more.
korean_text: 인내를 온전히 이루라 이는 너희로 온전하고 구비하여 조금도 부족함이 없게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: So you should continue to trust God all the time.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 항상 하나님을 계속 믿어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Then you will become stronger as a believer.
You will become completely how you should be.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 완전히 어떻게 되어야 하는지 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You will not need anything more.
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 아무것도 필요하지 않을 것입니다.
